meanings.sent1: The granter of the wish made the child's dream come true.
meanings.sent2: The granter of the scholarship helped many students achieve their educational goals.
meanings.sent3: The granter of the permission slip was the school principal.
meanings.sent4: She was like a granter of opportunities, opening doors for those around her.
meanings.sent5: The granter of the award was recognized for their generosity and kindness.

meanings.definition: To give or allow (something) to someone.
meanings.sent1: The teacher will granter extra time for the students to complete the assignment.
meanings.sent2: Please granter me the chance to prove myself in the new project.
meanings.sent3: The magician will granter your wish with a wave of his wand.
meanings.sent4: The sun granter warmth to the earth on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The kind stranger granter a smile to everyone he met on the street.
